# Unfazed (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level: [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]]**, [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 11th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 11]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a steel ingot worth 50 gp)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Arcane Magic (Four Winds Fantasy Gaming), pg. 31

You cannot suffer from the following conditions for the duration of the spell: [[Dazed|dazed]], [[Confused|confused]], [[Cowering|cowering]], [[Fascinated|fascinated]], [[Frightened|frightened]], [[Panicked|panicked]], or [[Shaken|shaken]]. While under the effects of *unfazed*, your [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] DC for being able to overcome injury and cast spells successfully is reduced to 10 + your caster level.
